00047 #define p3HST_ID    0x000fffff  /* Host ID */
00048 #define p3HST_IPV4  0x00100000  /* Host address is IPv4 */
00049 #define p3HST_IPV6  0x00200000  /* Host address is IPv6 */
00050 #define p3HST_ARRAY 0x00400000  /* Key arrays allowed */
00051 #define p3HST_KTYPE 0x0f000000  /* Key type field */
00052 #define p3HST_KTSHF 24          /* Field shift amount */

00065 #define p3GET_HOST_KEYTYPE(flag) \
00066     ((flag >> p3HST_KTSHF) & 0x0f)
00067 
00079 #define p3SET_HOST_KEYTYPE(flag, value) \
00080     flag &= ~(0x0f << p3HST_KTSHF); \
00081     flag |= value << p3HST_KTSHF;
